reviews.title: Impossible to have a good night sleep
reviews.text: I would recommend against this hotel because of one major point: you really can't get a good night sleep.

reviews.title: Bad value
reviews.text: All rooms faces the hotel carpark or the roads. Since there are no air conditioning in the rooms, you have to open to windows otherwise you room gets hot. There are tons of traffic in the carpark or the roads probably after 6am. Lots of tourists from tourist buses, catering trucks, trash vans... just extremely noisy and bothersome. Everyone in my tour group experienced this issue. It may be worst if you are staying in ground floor rooms.

reviews.title: Avoid this hotel at any cost

reviews.text: - Towels were thin, flimsy and smelt bad
reviews.title: Not to happy with our stay

reviews.text: I have to this hotel on three three different occasions. First it was in attendance of my work Christmas party. The other two times were business purposes. The rooms are quite spacious clean and quite trendy. The hotel is 5mins from the airport by car. It takes 15-20mins to the main city centre. The staff is very nice and friendly.
